title: Leicester City sign Blackburn Rovers winger Callum Wright
description: Leicester have signed Callum Wright from Blackburn for an undisclosed fee.
content: The 17-year-old winger has agreed a professional deal until 2021 at the Foxes, having scored four goals in 10 games for Rovers' U23s this season.Wright was previously on the books at Tranmere and Everton and signed a two-year scholarship at Ewood Park in 2016.Rovers' academy manager Stuart Jones told the club's website: "Ultimately, we did everything we could to try and keep Callum, but the situation was taken out of our hands when Premier League clubs became interested."He's a young player and when Premier League clubs came calling, both he and his family were keen to move on."Get Sky Sports from Â£18 a month and watch the latest transfers live in action for their new teams
